comment: Reminds me A LOT of Mellow Corn... Except it's younger, lower proof, and 4 times more expensive.... Their new make was great though. I wish they would age in full sized barrels for at least 4 years... Currently they are only in 20 liter barrels and less than 2 years old, then blended with sourced corn whiskey. I'm sure they can turn an excellent product considering their new make is great.... They are just not there yet.

On the nose you have turpentine,youngish body even though it’s blended with Kentucky Bourbon. There are hints of banana,plum and oak. I’m hopeful future releases will be solely from whiskey produced at the Hawaii distillery,aged at least 3 years.
